entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Changes 2000. The opinion of the adult population about the democratic political culture in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Szabó, Valéria
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E25: TÁRKI Changes 2000. The opinion of the adult population about the democratic political culture in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Csizér, Kata
entry.dcterms:description: opinions about democracy, democratic society; trust in public institutions; subjective financial situation, economic expectations; evaluation of the economic participation of the state; political prejudices; evaluation of NATO membership and participation; opinions about the EU accession; national consciousness, national identity; popularity of politicians, party preferences
entry.dcterms:subject: mass political behavior, attitudes
international politics and organisations
social behaviour and attitudes
political institutions, public administration
economic conditions and indicators
cultural and national identity
migration
social conditions and indicators
demography
person
survey data
time-series
Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the Leslie Kish key and the random walking method.
face-to-face interview
B
